overview:
Gonzalo Cavenaghi is an Analyst at Union Square Advisors. Prior to joining Union Square, Mr. Cavenaghi was an Analyst in the Global Technology Group at Lehman Brothers. Mr. Cavenaghi has worked on M&A and financing transactions for numerous technology companies, including Cisco, Eagle Test Systems, ON Semiconductor, SunPower and Micron Technology, as well as private equity firms including CCMP Capital Advisors.

Mr. Cavenaghi is a native of Puigari, Argentina and is fluent in Spanish.
